entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
